news_header: On Saturday, Israel is set to release 369 Palestinian prisoners while Hamas is expected to free three Israeli hostages as part of a ceasefire agreement. This marks the sixth prisoner exchange since the ceasefire began on January 19.
news_text: The continuation of the ceasefire was uncertain earlier this week due to Hamas's threat to freeze hostage releases over alleged violations by Israel, which in turn threatened to resume fighting. However, both parties have decided to proceed with the ceasefire agreement and negotiations for the next phase are ongoing.
